Text.Page:
The Atel Akaad is led by the devas, but the Lok followers include other races as well and not all of them were abducted and forced to convert. I don't know what lies the {@LinkCreature:25#2071#dark deacons} tell to gain willing converts, but I'd sure like to find out.

If you can defeat the deacons and bring their scriptures to me, I'm sure we'll find an answer.

I knew you could do it. Let's see what we have.

"The resurrection of Lok shall save you..."

It goes on, promising redemption in Lok's hands. These people don't know the deacons think of them as disposable assets! They're being lured in by pretty promises.
I know the Lok believers value their scripture above their own lives, but you have to find a way to collect one.
